definition.text: Now that you have a new rocking Profile, letâ€™s talk some more about that private key.

paragraphs.text: Your private key is the way you will be able to add your governance address to a crypto wallet. Superalgos generates it locally on your computer. This means that there is no one else in the world that has access, or knowledge, of your key.
This is the most important part of this tutorial! You must backup your private key!
If you linked a previously owned address you will not need to save the private key but should back up the contents of the constructor for safety.
